definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: The letters will be published in the summer of 2010.
sentences.chinese: 會在2010年夏天出版書信集。

sentences.english: This paper takes "Chi Chun Correspondence Collection" as the main research scope.
sentences.chinese: 本論文便是以《琦君書信集》爲主要研究範圍。

sentences.english: Reading the book will help us to study and understand the…
sentences.chinese: 對這部書信集的研究，是全面瞭解奈保爾的必要起點。
